GOAL OF THIS TALK ‚Ä¶
‚ùå Make You A Developer
‚úÖ Try Claude Code

"Claude Code is, with hindsight, poorly named. It‚Äôs not purely a coding tool: it‚Äôs a tool for general computer automation. Anything you can achieve by typing commands into a computer is something that can now be automated by Claude Code. It‚Äôs best described as a general agent. https://simonwillison.net/2025/Oct/16/claude-skills/"

Run Claude Code
1. Open the Claude App
2. Type your commands
3. Press Enter

Example: "Set a timer for 5 minutes"
Claude will then respond "Okay, I've set a timer for 5 minutes."

You can also use Claude to:
- Set reminders
- Create lists
- Answer questions
- Translate languages
Claude is constantly learning and improving. The more you use it, the better it will become!

Resources:
- Claude Website: www.claude.ai
- Claude Community Forum: claude.ai/community
